songs.title: Someone Else
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I can feel your way of love
It’s  like a storm moving in my soul
It  tastes so good, but it’s hard to keep with it
Cuz' you ain’t the only one, I’ve never told you

[Chorus]
Cuz' I’ve never looked for someone else
I’ve  never lost the love
And  I can’t say you’re lucky
For this has become something bad for you

[Verse 2]
Taste  my lips, touch my skin, do it all night
Do you want me? Want to make me scream? Do you know is all right?
Oh you, you make me feel so good

Look at me, wait for me, I’m thinking in both of us
I’ve  never got doubts, nobody should loose, is always the way of life
I know, I beg you for mercy

[Chorus]
Cuz' I’ve never looked for someone else
I’ve never lost the love
And I can’t say you’re lucky
For this has become something bad for you

[Outro]
Look at me
Wait for me
I’m thinking in both of us

I’ve never got doubts
Nobody should loose
Is always the way of life
